value.stringValue: AND( [Case].RecordType.DeveloperName ='Technical_Support', ISCHANGED([Case].Status ) , ISPICKVAL([Case].Status ,'In Progress'), LEFT([Case].OwnerId,3)="00G", OR( RIGHT([Case].Owner:Queue.DeveloperName ,3) ="Dev", RIGHT([Case].Owner:Queue.DeveloperName ,3) ="DEV", [Case].Owner:Queue.DeveloperName ="Phishline"), NOT(ISNULL([Case].Engineering_Escalated_By__c) ) )

AND( ISCHANGED([Case].OwnerId) , NOT(ISPICKVAL([Case].Status ,'Closed')), LEFT([Case].OwnerId,3)="00G", OR( RIGHT([Case].Owner:Queue.DeveloperName ,3) ="Dev", RIGHT([Case].Owner:Queue.DeveloperName ,3) ="DEV", [Case].Owner:Queue.DeveloperName ="Phishline") )
